summary: This document is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel regarding the organization and production of 3500 materials (likely discovery under the Jencks Act) for an upcoming hearing. It references a 'Daubed hearing' scheduled for the next day and includes attachments of preparation notes and indices.

persons.name: Visoski
persons.context: The email chain references 'Visoski's prep_notes.pdf' as an attachment, indicating someone is preparing materials related to this individual, likely for testimony or a hearing.

events.title: Daubed Hearing
events.description: A hearing is scheduled, prompting the urgent production of 3500 materials (discovery) the day prior.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office is actively organizing and producing 3500 materials (likely Jencks Act material for witness testimony) on November 9, 2021.
A hearing referred to as the 'Daubed hearing' is scheduled for November 10, 2021, driving the urgency of the document production.
The correspondence includes attachments named 'Visoski_prep_notes.pdf' and references an index for the 3500 productions, indicating organized preparation for legal proceedings.
